mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(DT_DEPARTURE, '%Y-%m-%d %H ') AS data, floor(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,DT_DEPARTURE, DT_DEPARTURED))) AS value from T_H_RESULT where YEAR(DT_DEPARTURE)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_DEPARTURED)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVAL)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVED)>'2000' GROUP BY data ORDER BY data;

select DATE_FORMAT(DT_ARRIVAL, '%Y-%m-%d %H ') AS data, floor(AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,DT_ARRIVAL, DT_ARRIVED))) AS value from T_H_RESULT where YEAR(DT_DEPARTURE)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_DEPARTURED)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVAL)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVED)>'2000' GROUP BY data ORDER BY data;

select DT_DEPARTURE as data, floor(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,DT_DEPARTURE, DT_DEPARTURED)/60) AS value from T_H_RESULT where YEAR(DT_DEPARTURE)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_DEPARTURED)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVAL)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVED)>'2000' GROUP BY N_CARNUM, data, value ORDER BY data;

select DT_ARRIVAL as data, floor(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,DT_ARRIVAL, DT_ARRIVED)/60) AS value from T_H_RESULT where YEAR(DT_DEPARTURE)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_DEPARTURED)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVAL)>'2000' and YEAR(DT_ARRIVED)>'2000' GROUP BY N_CARNUM, data, value ORDER BY data;
